Package de.lessvoid.niftyinternal

THIS IS THE NIFTY PRIVATE API.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    NiftyConfiguration
    Represents configurable values inside of Nifty.
    NiftyResourceLocation
    A location from which resources can be loaded
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    InternalNiftyEventBus  
    InternalNiftyImage  
    InternalNiftyNodeAccessorRegistry  
    InternalNiftyNodeInputHandler
    This class handles all of the input events for a single node.
    NiftyConfigurationImpl
    Created by void on 13.09.15.
    NiftyResourceLoader
    A simple wrapper around resource loading should anyone decide to change their minds how this is meant to work in the future.
    PaddingAttributeParser
    one value: [applied to all] two values: [top and bottom], [left and right] three values: [top], [left and right], [bottom] four values: [top], [right], [bottom], [left]

Package de.lessvoid.niftyinternal Description

THIS IS THE NIFTY PRIVATE API. Don't use classes from this package in your code! Classes in here can change without any warning. Don't depend on this stuff ... innocent unicorns will be killed if you do.
Since:
2.0
